local_intent: Perform a straight 0.1 push on the T-block toward 0° after verifying visibility and aligning; confirm by checking at the goal region.
assumptions: Goal region location is available from prior steps; IsAt(goal_region) is sufficient as a lightweight verification.
coherence_with_global: Respects the global plan's transfer phase: perception guard -> ApproachAndAlign -> SetTCPYaw(0) -> Push(t_block, 0.1, 0°, 1200ms) -> verify at goal_region.
